subject: Horse Racing
organizations: New York State Racing and Wagering Board
lead_paragraph: In the wake of allegations of horse abuse on Ernie Paragallo’s Center Brook Farm, the New York State Racing and Wagering Board has made plans to tighten its ownership and authorized-agent licensing procedures.
snippet: In the wake of allegations of horse abuse on Ernie Paragallo’s Center Brook Farm, the New York State Racing and Wagering Board has made plans to tighten its ownership and authorized-agent licensing procedures.
